name: opencode-warcraft
description: Context-Driven Development for AI coding assistants

scripts.build: bun run --filter warcraft-core build && bun run --filter opencode-warcraft build && bun run --filter opencode-copilot-message build
scripts.test: bun run --filter warcraft-core build && bun run --filter '*' test
scripts.lint: bun run --filter warcraft-core typecheck && bun run --filter opencode-warcraft typecheck && bun run --filter opencode-copilot-message typecheck
scripts.lint:unused: bunx tsc -p packages/warcraft-core/tsconfig.json --noEmit --noUnusedLocals --noUnusedParameters && bunx tsc -p packages/opencode-warcraft/tsconfig.json --noEmit --noUnusedLocals --noUnusedParameters && bunx tsc -p packages/opencode-copilot-message/tsconfig.json --noEmit --noUnusedLocals --noUnusedParameters
scripts.workflow:verify: bun run beads:verify && bun run pr:evidence:verify
scripts.release:check: bun install --frozen-lockfile && bun run build && bun run test && bun run lint && bun run lint:unused
